metadata.Title: CVE-2015-20108 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
xml_security.rb in the ruby-saml gem before 1.0.0 for Ruby allows XPathinjection and code execution because prepared statements are not used.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-20108` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ruby-saml - 1.7.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ruby-saml package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.2-1').
